author: mmusich
body:
backport of #16898 
Few miscellaneous fixes in the PV Validation tool to better deal with phase-I data:
   * allow dynamic selection via all-in-one metadata of the eta range of the probe track
   * allow selection of tracks avoiding either the barrel or the forward pixel partitions
   * allow choice of CPE used in the track refit (avoid templates for phase-I)
   * added aggregated canvases for the resolutions and pulls 
   * add steering of plotting style from ini metadata
   * add x- and y- transverse IP projections
title: [81X] PV-Validation for phase I
